channel.title: Help with 4th junk (wasteland sp. mission)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Help with 4th junk (wasteland sp. mission)"

item.title: Re: Help with 4th junk (wasteland sp. mission)
item.content:encoded: Switch teams to Tubby 2, Jaws and Chunks after you start the mission. That will give you +12 tai levels and +19 tai range, and almost guarantee success unless you have a really low tai level.

item.title: Help with 4th junk (wasteland sp. mission)
item.content:encoded:
i passed the first 3 junk really easy. the the fourth junk is tai 25 diff. and 14 successes
i can get 9. ive tryed switing teams in the mission and using Rock On: Wide Load +5 Tai Successes, -5 Strength, -20 Stamina. i got a tai range of 16. and one success any idea what i should do? i dont want to stop after going this far. thanks
